name: Les Kurbas
generalDescription: The commemorative coin is devoted to Les Kurbas (1887-1937), a prominent stage director, actor, educator, playwright and translator. Les (Oleksandr-Zenon) Stepanovych Kurbas was a theatre figure, whose creative work was influenced by expressionism and constructivism, the founder of the Ukrainian modern theatre “Berezil”.
averseDescription: On the coin obverse in the upper part the Small National Emblem of Ukraine is depicted, under which in the right part the inscription НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ / БАНК / УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) is placed against the glass background. Below, against the background of a conventionalized circle there are the inscriptions: 2 ГРИВНІ/ 2007 (2Hryvnia/ 2007) and the NBU Mint logotype
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse Les Kurbas is portrayed against the conventionalized geometric decorative pattern used in poster design in the 20s of the XX century; above, to the left, there is the year of birth – 1887, below, to the right, the year of death – 1937, underneath – diagonal inscription – ЛЕСЬ КУРБАС (Les Kurbas).
